org.bytemechanics.cache.flashback

Interface CacheRegistryAdapter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CacheRegistry, TTLCacheRegistry

    public interface CacheRegistryAdapter
    Cache registry interface to which defines the format of the cache
    Author:
    afarre

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getKey()
      Recover cache key
      Supplier getSupplier()
      Recover cache value supplier
      default boolean isValid(CacheInstanceAdapter _instance)
      Validate if the provided cache instance is still valid
      default Object supplyCacheValue()
      Return a new instance of the cache.
      CacheInstanceAdapter supplyInstance()
      Recover a CacheInstanceAdapter instance with the value supplied by the internal supplier

    • Method Detail

      • getKey

        String getKey()
        Recover cache key
        Returns:
        cache key

      • getSupplier

        Supplier getSupplier()
        Recover cache value supplier
        Returns:

      • supplyInstance

        CacheInstanceAdapter supplyInstance()
        Recover a CacheInstanceAdapter instance with the value supplied by the internal supplier
        Returns:
        CacheInstanceAdapter instance value

      • supplyCacheValue

        default Object supplyCacheValue()
        Return a new instance of the cache. By default execute the supplier to get the new instance
        Returns:
        new cache instance

      • isValid

        default boolean isValid(CacheInstanceAdapter _instance)
        Validate if the provided cache instance is still valid
        Parameters:
        _instance - cache instance to validate
        Returns:
        true if the given instance is still valid, false otherwise
